CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 27, 1961, pg. 17, reads: " Fashion Review - John Wesley AME Zion Church was the scene of the recent all-ages Fashion Review, directed by Mrs. Lena Davis. Prizes were given to those doing the best display in their classes.  Front row, left to right: Emma Lou Pryor, standing; seated, Mrs. Ira Patton, Mrs. Shelia Wright and Jo Linda Terry, and Rhonda Estes.  Second row: Mrs. Lena B. Davis, Olivet Yvonne, Mrs. Olivet Johnson, Beverly WIlliams, Sherwyn Mitchell, Velma Jean WIlliams, and the Rev. H.A.L. Clement, pastor.
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, including in front row: Emma Lou Pryor, Mrs. Ira Patton, Shelia Wright, Jo Lindo Terry, Rhonda Estes; back row: Lena B. Davis, Olivet Johnson holding Olivet Yvonne, Beverly Williams, Sherwyn Mitchell, Velma Jean Williams, and Reverend H.A.L. Clement in front of room divider with two American flags and flower arrangements for Fashion Review at John Wesley AME Zion Church
